'''Deliberation of Choice''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deliberation of Choice is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] underground after defeating a group of [[Stretchy Geo Fungus|Geo Fungi]] in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
